lineage.Process: CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2011.2 FNID_OLD [FNID] VB #
CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2013.2 EFF_YEAR 2013 VB #
CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2013.2 FIND_X [FNID] VB #

CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2011.2 EFF_YEAR 2011 VB #
CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2011.2 EFF_PERD 2 VB #
CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2011.2 ADMIN0 "Afghanistan" VB #
CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2011.2 FNID ""AF2011C3" + right([admin3],4) + right([lzcode],2)" VB #
CalculateField AF_Admin2_LHZ_2011.2 ADMIN3 "" VB #
CalculateField FEWSNET_Current_Mapping EFF_PERD 3 VB #

CalculateField ipc_current_mapping POLY_NAME "[ADMIN0] & "+" & [ADMIN1]& "+" & [ADMIN2]& "+" & [ADMIN3]& "+" & [LZCODE]" VB #
CalculateField ipc_current_mapping POLY_ID [FNID] VB #
